Effect Description: If you move 20ft in a straight line, your next attack deals +1d6 damage and knocks the target Prone.
When hit by melee, reduce the damage taken by 1d6 + Might.
Your melee reach increases by +5 feet on your turn.
You can move through trees, rafters, or hanging ropes at full speed without checks.
Gain Advantage on checks to avoid being knocked Prone or Shoved.
Use your tail to press buttons, pull levers, or lift light items (under 5lbs) behind you.
For the rest of this turn, your ranged attacks ignore Half-Cover and Three-Quarters Cover.
You treat Dim Light as Bright Light and Darkness as Dim Light.
Hang upside down from a stable point; Ranged attacks against you have Disadvantage.
Hold a torch or light item in your tail, leaving your hands free for weapons/shields.
Instantly pinpoint the location of any invisible or hidden moving creature within 30ft.
You suffer no penalties to Perception when listening through doors or thin walls.
Shake your body to fire loose quills in a 10ft cone (Dex save for damage).
Any creature that Grapples you or hits you with an Unarmed Strike takes 1d4 Piercing damage.
Once per encounter, reduce the damage of an incoming Bludgeoning attack by half.
You are immune to extreme cold weather and resist Cold damage.
If you have a target Grappled, make a free claw attack against them with Advantage.
You gain a Climb Speed equal to your Walk Speed.
When an enemy enters the space directly behind you, make a reflex attack against them.
Move through a smaller enemy's space. They must save or take damage and fall Prone.
Release a 5ft cloud. Creatures inside must save or be Sickened (Disadvantage on attacks).
Mark an area. Animals of your species recognize your claim and may be Friendly or Fearful.
You can bite through inanimate objects (wood, bone, soft metal) to sunder items.
Creatures grappled by your mouth have Disadvantage on checks to escape.
Bellow to give allies within 30ft a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls for the next round.
You are immune to "Critical Hits" caused by called shots to the neck or strangulation.
When targeted by a humanoid, force a Will save. On fail, they must choose a different target.
You can use the Help action as a Bonus Action by catching an enemy's gaze.
Shout in a 15ft cone. Targets must save or be Deafened and take Thunder damage.
Swallow a small object (key/ring) instantly to hide it, regurgitating it later safely.
If standing near foliage, turn Invisible until you move or attack.
You deal extra damage on attacks against creatures that haven't detected you yet.
You ignore Difficult Terrain caused by snow, mud, or sand.
You gain a Swim Speed equal to your Walk Speed.
Automatically succeed on a check to escape a Grapple.
You dry off instantly and never suffer penalties from being wet or cold due to water.
Clean self or ally to remove smells and dirt, curing minor diseases or parasites.
Your fur makes no sound. Gain Advantage on Stealth checks in quiet environments.
Listen to a door to identify exactly how many creatures are in the next room.
Take half damage from a Ranged Attack that you hear coming.
Moving at normal speed does not impose penalties on Stealth checks.
You take half damage from falls and always land on your feet.
Attempt to steal an item from an adjacent distracted target (Sleight of Hand).
If you Grapple a target, you can prevent them from speaking or casting verbal spells.
Eat spoiled food/raw meat to regain Hit Points as if it were a standard ration.
You have Advantage on saving throws against Ingested Poisons.

Type: Enemies ignore you if you are Prone.
No Perception penalty in dim light.
